Reminder

Stop making careless mistakes!!!

Tonight I spent more than half an hour on adding a random function to my blog banner images with javascript (thanks to Ionuț G. Stan providing a method).
I just kept making some tiny mistakes in spelling, addressing, constructing.
It was a stupid problem even though being a beginner.
Focus Focus Focus!
